Various minor bug fixes.
Various minor bug fixes.

– New location Laboratory.
– New monsters added.
– Access to Farm, Hunt, Mad Dogs' Arena events and Gate 3 location closed.
– Game interface changed.
– In-game store design and contents changed.
– Some resources removed.
– Inventory and all storages have been increased from 4 to 5 slots in each line.
– Daily premium subscription disabled. Those who had it active will receive one-off rewards to their inboxes.
– Endless energy subscription added.
– Recipes overhauled.

– New location Laboratory.
– New monsters added.

– Game interface changed.

- Female character added.
- Character customization added.
- Errors fixed.
- Game performance improved.

- Incubator updated.
- Two dinopets added.

A small update to make sure the game runs smoothly.
A small update to make sure the game runs smoothly.

— Season 2 is on: new quests and new rewards in Hunter's Diary!
— Hunt for alpha dinosaurs.
— New pet T-Rex.
— New weapon Grenade Launcher LG5.
— New armor.
— New items for exchange at Trader's.

— Season 2 is on: new quests and new rewards in Hunter's Diary!
— Hunt for alpha dinosaurs.
— New pet T-Rex.
— New weapon Grenade Launcher LG5.
— New armor.
— New items for exchange at Trader's.
A small update to make sure the game runs smoothly.
A small update to make sure the game runs smoothly.

- Ready for a hunt? Season 3 begins!
- The new character Floki is an unfortunate traveler and just a good guy who is ready to share useful loot for a little favor.
- Floki gives contracts for anything: from hunting zebras to killing murderous predators.
- Dinoleaders keep filling the jungle! Alpha Smilodon and Alpha Ankylosaurus are thirsty for blood.
- We've added a new gun and a set of armor. And the atmosphere of primeval hunt will create a freshly added bow.

- Ready for a hunt? Season 3 begins!
- The new character Floki is an unfortunate traveler and just a good guy who is ready to share useful loot for a little favor.
- Floki gives contracts for anything: from hunting zebras to killing murderous predators.
- Dinoleaders keep filling the jungle! Alpha Smilodon and Alpha Ankylosaurus are thirsty for blood.
- We've added a new gun and a set of armor. And the atmosphere of primeval hunt will create a freshly added bow.
A small update to make sure the game runs smoothly.
A small update to make sure the game runs smoothly.

— No time to spare! New tasks in Hunter's Diary won't complete themselves.
— Joint adventures with the hunters faction.
— New item for base 'Hunters' Box".

— No time to spare! New tasks in Hunter's Diary won't complete themselves.
— Joint adventures with the hunters faction.
— New item for base 'Hunters' Box".

- We have cleared the way to the swamp location. Explore it and face a new predator - imperial sarcosuchus!
- Get an iron hatchet and pickaxe when going to the swamp because the area is full of teak trees and bauxite deposits.
- They invented a new equipment type in the jungle, a wrist crossbow. Only the mechanic from laboratory Alfa knows the secret technology of its making.

- We have cleared the way to the swamp location. Explore it and face a new predator - imperial sarcosuchus!
- Get an iron hatchet and pickaxe when going to the swamp because the area is full of teak trees and bauxite deposits.
- They invented a new equipment type in the jungle, a wrist crossbow. Only the mechanic from laboratory Alfa knows the secret technology of its making.

— Season 5 starts in the jungle.
— Technology of constructing pedestals with skeletons of dinosaurs, giving buffs discovered.
— Challenges on the new location Hunting Grounds are waiting for daredevils! Fight with the most dangerous dinos, complete quests and dig up valuable bones.
— New stealth armor and a powerful bow.
